text: Adina Pintilie (born 12 January 1980) is a Romanian film director and screenwriter. Her debut film Touch Me Not was awarded the Golden Bear at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. She has studied at the Ion Luca Caragiale National University of Theatre and Film. == Filmography == === Director === {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Film !!
